channel.title: NPC's not dying
channel.description:
My NPC's were fine. But I have no clue what happened but now they wont die. I kill them HP reachs 0 but they dont fall down and die anymore...
Help?
I think its somewhere in NPCHandler but considering I dont have Client.Java and dont have search I have to look through it manually taking forever -.-' Anyway.. Help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 03:26:11 AM[/size][hr]nevermind, found and fixed (Although jad did glitch and didnt die and had to use G D to kill him but is now all good)

item.title: NPC's not dying
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

I had exactly the same problem. Its your NPCHandler. Download the ORIGINAL source, copy and paste all of your updates, edited parts of your OLD NPCHandler (That is to say, the one corrupted) into the new clean one. Compile and run = fix

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's not dying
item.dc:creator: @pennence_codes pennence codes
item.description:
@pennence_codes wrote:

try re editing there hp’s and making them mageable.

if u want il look at my npc coding we compare them and find the solution

p.s. heya evil its pennenec =]

im coding again 2
